feed.title: Jack Keynes
feed.subtitle: The archive of cryptic crosswords and puzzles by Jack H Keynes.

entry.title: #319: Nude Beach
entry.content: Hi all! An ordinary 15x15 grid for you all this week—and good luck! (parses) Thank you to Liari and MP for testing clues in this puzzle.
